name: wimpykidtrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Wimpy Kid Trivia”
”Alexa, start Wimpy Kid Trivia”
”Alexa, launch Wimpy Kid Trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wimpy kid trivia
des:
Love the Wimpy Kid books? Me too. 
Test how much you know the book "Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days" by Jeff Kinney. 
There are 5 questions in every game. On every question there are 4 answers. Select one which you think is correct.
If you need to hear the question again, just say," Repeat.” 
At the end of the game you will hear your score. 
You can play this game more than once because some of the questions and answers will be different.
I hope you will enjoy this Wimpy Kid Trivia as much I enjoyed creating it!
To start a game, just say," Alexa, Open Wimpy Kid Trivia." 
If you want to hear the question again, say, "Repeat." 
If you don't want to play anymore, just say," Alexa, Stop."
Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
